articles.description: Adani Group's cement division, ACC, on Monday announced that its consolidated profit for the June quarter decreased by 22.5% year-on-year, totaling Rs 361.40 crore. Additionally, revenue dropped by 1% year-on-year to Rs 5,155 crore.
